caseTitle: Raja Amer Khan and another v. The Federation of Pakistan through the Secretary Law and Justice Division, Ministry of Law and Justice Islamabad and others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Various provisions of the Supreme Court (Practice and Procedure) Act, 2023 (2) Legislative Competence (3) Doctrine of Intra Vires and Ultra Vires (4) Retroactive or Ex Post Facto Right of Appeal (5) Distinction between Articles 184 and 199 of the Constitution (6) Doctrine of Reading Down (7) Change of Counsel in Review Petition (8) Master of the Roster (9) Effect of Act on Decided Cases (10) Hearing by Full Court.
